$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/rea.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/readme
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/rea.text:
<$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-]] [get[author]] [[-lightblue?style=flat]] +[join[]]}}} />
<$button class="get-started"> Install Giscus {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <> <$set name="repo" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class="get-started" tooltip={{{ [get[repo]addsuffix[ discussions]] }}}> <> Discussions
<<< {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} A Commenting System Powered By Github Discussions. Let Visitors Leave Comments And Reactions On Your Site With Github! This Project Is Strongly Inspired By Utterances. <<< !! TODO * jump to comment directly * [[discus|https://bimlas.gitlab.io/tw5-disqus]]

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text:
\whitespace trim \define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config \define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter You may have to save and reload the wiki to activate changes. * Install giscus for your github repo [[Install Giscus|https://github.com/apps/giscus/installations/new]] * [[get giscus parameter|https://giscus.app/zh-CN]] change badge style   <$select field="style" tiddler=<> tooltip='badge style'> <>
Github Repo Link: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repo" tag="input" placeholder="username/repo" default="" />
Github Reop Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repoId" tag="input" placeholder="TSJHFJDKHJExxx" default="" />
Github Repo Category Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="categoryId" placeholder="DKSOFHGJVDKLXX" tag="input" default="" />
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> Reset filter <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>>/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/discussions
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.text: \whitespace trim \define giscusDiscussions() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} \end \define giscusBadge() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="imgshield" value="https://img.shields.io/github/discussions/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> get[repo]addprefixaddsuffix[?style=]] [get[style]] +[join[]]}}} > \end

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/get-started
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/mac.text:
<!-- general -->
\define nbtn(started-tid, class:"get-started", caption:"Get Started")
  <$button class=$class$ tooltip="$caption$">
    $caption$
    <!-- list filter todo -->
    <$action-navigate $to={{{ $started-tid$ }}}/>
  </$button>
\end

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/sty.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/style
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/sty.text:
<!-- hide powered not work-->
.gsc-left-header {
    display: none !important;
}

#__next .text-sm {
    font-size: .875rem;
    line-height: 1.25rem;
		color: red !important;
}

<!-- btn style -->
.get-started {
		display: inline-block;
    font-size: 16px;
    <!-- background-color: rgb(97, 218, 251); -->
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    padding: 10px 25px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border-color: white;
    white-space: nowrap;
    transition: background-color 0.2s ease-out 0s;
}

.nbtn {
		display: inline-block;
    <!-- background-color: rgb(97, 218, 251); -->
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    padding: 3px 8px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: background-color 0.2s ease-out 0s;
}

.giscus-footer {
    color: #aaaaaa;
    font-size: 14px;
}

.giscus-footer:hover {
    <!-- border-bottom: 2px solid; -->
    <!-- color: black; -->
}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-pagecontrol
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.caption: giscus
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/gis.text: \whitespace trim \define tid() Comment Area <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> <$button tooltip="Message Here" aria-label="Message Here" class=<> set="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments" setTo=<> > {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$action-navigate $to=<>/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="giscus"/>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/viewtemplate
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/vie.text: <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter}]" variable="comment"> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/info/browser/is/mobile]get[text]else[no]match[no]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$set name="stateTiddler" value="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<> setTo=<> > <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Show Comments <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> ÊòæÁ§∫ËØÑËÆ∫ <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<> setTo=""> <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> Fold Comments <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> Êî∂Ëµ∑ËØÑËÆ∫ <$giscus id=<> lang="en" theme="light"/>
